# <a name="how-to-reply-to-or-forward-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="1036f-102">メッセージに返信するまたはメッセージを転送する方法</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1036f-102">How to reply to or forward messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1036f-103">メッセージ ウィンドウの右上隅で、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1036f-103">At the top right corner of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="1036f-104">[返信]、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1036f-104">Reply</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="1036f-105">[全員に返信]、または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1036f-105">to Reply, Reply all, or Forward.</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="1036f-106">[転送] を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1036f-106">Forward</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="1036f-107">この方法の詳細については、「[Outlook.com でメール メッセージの作成、返信、転送を行う](https://support.office.com/article/5a240eb5-8840-4146-b5e8-b078dce6e5e4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1036f-107">Learn more about how to [Create, reply to, or forward email messages in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5a240eb5-8840-4146-b5e8-b078dce6e5e4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
